page.title: 19 The Gate Services
page.content: The petrol filling station at the Gate Services near Dunkirk employs 9 staff on a shift system with a 24 hour service.Shifts are of eight hours each,except the night shift which is 11 hours.As with most filling stations,the owners have developed a small shop around the pay desk to catch the motorist or lorry driver with a thirst,a car problem or a present to buy.The items sold include icecreams and drinks,car accessories,toys,ready food for the hungry traveller in the form of ham or cheese rolls and fresh flowers for the wife or girlfriend.On the Canterbury bound side of the road a new garage has been built one year ago and a new Little Chef restaurant is near completion.
